text: @PressSec @realDonaldTrump You can lie to tRump’s base but everyone else knows better. BTW our death rate of all resolved Covid-19 cases is 40%. That rate can be laid directly at tRump’ feet and all his sycophant GOP asshats (like you) that denied and/or flat out lied about the seriousness of this virus.
